SEARCH
Package io.github.ulalax.zmq

Enum Class SocketMonitorEvent

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<SocketMonitorEvent>
io.github.ulalax.zmq.SocketMonitorEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SocketMonitorEvent>, Constable
public enum SocketMonitorEvent extends Enum<SocketMonitorEvent>
ZeroMQ socket monitor events.

Monitor events are triggered when socket state changes occur. These events can be monitored using Socket.monitor(String, SocketMonitorEvent).

Events include:

  • CONNECTED - Socket connected to peer
  • CONNECT_DELAYED - Synchronous connect failed, retrying
  • CONNECT_RETRIED - Asynchronous connect attempt
  • LISTENING - Socket bound to address
  • BIND_FAILED - Bind attempt failed
  • ACCEPTED - Connection accepted
  • ACCEPT_FAILED - Accept attempt failed
  • CLOSED - Socket closed
  • CLOSE_FAILED - Close attempt failed
  • DISCONNECTED - Socket disconnected from peer
  • MONITOR_STOPPED - Monitoring stopped
  • ALL - All events
